Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Noggin \Nog"gin\, n. [Ir. noigin, or Gael. noigean. Cf. 1st {Nog}.] 1. A small mug or cup. [1913 Webster]
2. A measure equivalent to a gill. Hence: a small quantity of a beverage. [Prov. Eng.] [1913 Webster]
3. The head (of a person). [slang]
Syn: noodle, noddle. [PJC]
noggin n : informal terms for a human head [syn: {attic}, {bean}, {bonce}, {noodle}, {dome}]
